name: Goopy
description:
This is our submission for the Stay Safe! Jam
We wanted to make a game that had bouncy  boys to make you smile. 

The theme was solidarity. We showed this in two ways, the slimes become one and the players become one. Both getting bigger because with solidarity ideas are stronger and bigger. 

Enjoy!

Controls:
WASD moves you around

Shift - sprint

Mouse wheel - rotates net

You can only catch slimes you are bigger then. 

too get bigger, catch slimes or dance with a bud
